Articles.Content: Is it me or does everything seem alot more floppier?

oooh myy

In all seriousness, the parts in KSP seem about the same.

oooh myy

WOOOW!

I think spaceplanes might be a bit wibbly wobbly!

What are things my girlfriend asks when a new KSP release results in neglect, Alex?

But nah, not that I've noticed, anyway. Everything seems appropriately rigid. Maybe you've used KJR previously and forgot to add it to your new save?

*checks inside pants* Ya a bit but then agian I dont have anything motivating me at the moment

now if were talking about rockets in KSP I havent noticed any problems. The same designs that worked before work now, well asside from the spaceplanes that had parts removed, had to redesign those.
